title: Egg Kuzhi Paniyaram Recipe, Finger food Recipe Ideas for Toddlers and Babies
content:
I made this egg paniyaram a few days back. Before adding the seasoning I too some batter and added only salt and pepper to that and made few paniyaram..Everyone loved it. I thought of sharing it as a separate post so you can find it under finger food for babies..Hope you will give this a try and let me know how it turned out for you..

 

Preparation Time: 10 mins

Cooking Time: 2 to 3 mins per batch

Serves: 2 to 3 

 

Ingredients:

Idli or Dosa Batter – 2 cup

Egg – 2

Oil or Ghee for frying 

Freshly Crushed Black Pepper – to taste

Salt to taste

 

Method:

Take eggs in a blender and blend till it is whipped.

Now take dosa batter in a bowl, add eggs, salt, pepper in it and mix well.

Heat paniyaram pan with some oil. Pour a handful of batter in and cook till golden on both sides on low heat.

Serve.

Mini Potato Paratha Recipe, Finger Food Ideas for Babies
recommendations.content:
Paratha is a great food for babies. Not for little ones, I started feeding paratha when maha was 15 months. I made soft paratha and chapatis, tore it into small pieces. Since it is so soft Kid loves it so much.

recommendations.title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
recommendations.content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
